schema.description: Describes the state of the storageVersion at a certain point.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

observedGeneration.description: If set, this represents the .metadata.generation that the condition was set based upon.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.
